scripts.pages: npm run types && npm run jsdoc
scripts.docs: npm run types && npm run jsdoc
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run docs && npm run pages && npm publish
scripts.tests: npm run madge && concurrently "npm run typewatch" "jest --watchAll"
scripts.postgit: git push origin master && npm run patch
scripts.ncu: ncu -u && npm i && npm audit fix
scripts.git: npm run ncu && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.client:build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build client/index.html -d dist --no-source-maps --no-cache --public-url ./
scripts.client:start: concurrently "npm run typewatch" "parcel client/index.html --global md -p 8080 --open -d dist watch"
